main_topic.author: OminousDude
main_topic.title: Will keywords ever have people or not?
main_topic.content: I wanted to know if later on or in the private lb we will have people so that we could all know how to prompt engineer our models ahead of time!

comments.author: waechter
comments.content:
people category is dropped from the full competition.

Answered here: [https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/llm-20-questions/discussion/512955#2884981](https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/llm-20-questions/discussion/512955#2884981)
